Text:
why do all these torrents come with windows system info files that cant be opened? 22 text files wich are basically links to the users websites-samples?! its motd!!!!
1 avi file -thas all we want
they are nfo files which can be opened. you can right click on it and open it with notepad. or you can use an application like damn nfo viewer to open them
whaleoilbeefhooked:  You're getting a torrent for free.  How hard is it to delete all of the files apart from the avi file you want?
